## ParagraphExtension class

The paragraph is one of the essential building blocks for a prosemirror editor and by default it is provided to all editors.


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ParagraphExtension extends NodeExtension<ParagraphExtensionOptions> 
```
